name: CHP Ads Block Detector
author: Suresh Chand

sections.description:
Adblocking extensions are most used to block the ads shown in browsers or websites. Nowadays, Adblock Plus is a popular extension to block ads in browsers. This will decrease the revenue of the blog owner.

Now, We have introduced the WordPress plugin (CHP Ads Block Detector WordPress Plugin) that will detect most of the AdBlock extensions installed on the browser and show a popup to disable the extension. This plugin restricts the user to access the page unless the user will disable the extension for your website.

This will work for most of the ads block extension such as Adblock, AdBlock Plus, ghostery, etc.

This plugin will also works for opera built-in ads block extension.

IMPORTANT
We have remove the Image Request from the plugin. So, Some of the extension may not be detected. If you found any extension that is not detecting then create a ticket on our website.
In case of any issue with the plugin, Please visit the Documentation page.
Most of the users faced issue with the uBlock extension. To fix this issue, Please visit Documentation page to fix for uBlock Extension.

TESTED FOR:

  • ☞ Adblock Plus
  • ☞ Adblock
  • ☞ Adguard
  • ☞ Adremover
  • ☞ Adblock for Chrome™
  • ☞ Brave
  • ☞ Ghostery
  • ☞ uBlocker
  • ☞ uBlock
  • ☞ Ultrablock
  • ☞ Privacy Badger
  • ☞ DuckDuckGo
  • ☞ Disconnect
  • ☞ Microsoft Edge AdBlock extension
  • ☞ Firefox Tracking Protection
  • ☞ uBlock Origin
  • ☞ Fair AdBlocker
  • ☞ Hola ad remover
  • ☞ Comodo AdBlocker
  • ☞ Opera Built-in AdBlock extension

Features:

  • ☞ Doesn\’t any extension or library (Even jQuery)
  • ☞ Lightweight ☞ Ability to customize the title
  • ☞ Ability to customize messages
  • ☞ Hide or Show Refresh and Close Button
  • ☞ Change style of the popup
  • ☞ Customize own title or message
  • ☞ Custom Buttons
  • ☞ Random Class Generator

PRO Features:

  • ☞ Button Text Customizable
  • ☞ Overlay Effect Customizable
  • ☞ Dark and Light Theme
  • ☞ Control Body Scroll
  • ☞ Disable plugin for Pages
  • ☞ Disable for Woocommerce Pages
  • ☞ Disable for individual posts or pages
  • ☞ Adjust to theme color
  • ☞ Ability to add custom modal
  • ☞ Completly Random Class Generator Control
  • ☞ Content Wrapper
  • ☞ Modal Animation
  • ☞ And much much more …

For more information regarding adblock detecting and revenue recovery, please visit CHP Adblock

CUSTOM WEBSITE

If you have custom website and want to add Adblock Detector on your website then please visit CHP Adblock Script for Custom Website
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

STEP:

  • ☞ Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ads-block-detector directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • ☞ Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  • ☞ Use the Settings ->* Ads Block Detector* screen to configure the plugin
  • ☞ (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
WHAT IS CONTENT WRAPPER SETTINGS?

Content Wrapper settings is new released settings on PRO release. This settings will detect the content on the page and blur the content and show the adblock message over the content. You don’t need additional setup for this. Just enable this settings. For more details, check here.

IS IT WORKING FOR OPERA BUILT-IN ADS BLOCKER EXTENSION?

Yes, we have tested our plugin for opera built-in ads blocker extension on 1.2 version. We would recommend you to use latest version which will support for opera also.

IS IT WORKING WITH GOOGLE ADSENSE?

Yes, and probably with all kinds of content hidden by AdBlocker software.

IS IT COMBABILITY WITH CACHING SYSTEM?

Yes, it is. It may depend on the parameter also. But clear the settings after changing the plugin settings.

IS THIS COMPATIBLE WITH WOOCOMMERCE?

Yes, it is. It will compatible with most of the plugin that exists on WordPress repository.

I FOUND INCOMPATIBILITY, WHAT WILL I DO?

Please create a forum in https://chpadblock.com/docs/support/ or WordPress support inside the CHP Ad Block Detector section. We will contact you as soon as possible.

CAN I IMPLEMENT CUSTOM MODAL?

Yes, For this you have to purchase the premium version of Ads Block Detector. And also check the documentation.

  • ☞ Security Update
  • ☞ Noscript supported added since brave browser has block script supports

4.0

  • ☞ Security Update
  • ☞ Compatible with WP 6.4.1

3.9.8

  • ☞ Security Update

3.9.5

  • ☞ Include Script in Header or Footer Support
  • ☞ Compressed Scripts
  • ☞ Fixed for uBlock origin extension
  • ☞ Minor issues fixed

3.9.4

  • ☞ Fixed for uBlock origin extension
  • ☞ Compressed Scripts
  • ☞ Remove multiple ads servers. Now, Only check via class request and google add request.
  • ☞ Minor issues fixed

3.9.3

  • ☞ Fixed for Brave Browser Adblock
  • ☞ Updated Server List
  • ☞ Minor issues fixed

3.9.2

  • ☞ Minor issues fixed

3.8.9

  • ☞ Removed Image Request Method
  • ☞ Minor issues fixed

  • ☞ Favicon not showing on activation [Oceanwp theme]

3.8.7

  • ☞ Popup Vertical Alignment
  • ☞ Adguard popup fixed

3.8.3

3.8.2

  • ☞ Server List Added
  • ☞ Minor issues fixed

3.8.1

  • ☞ Improve Random Class generator
  • ☞ Compatible with wordpress 6.0

3.6.1

  • ☞ Multiple Ads server added
  • ☞ Supported to wordpress 6.0 Version

3.5

  • ☞ Sine our plugin is whitelist autmatically by adblock extension, We have added random class generator to free version also. We request you to update your plugin immediately.
  • ☞ Random Class Generator [On every refresh, the classes and ids are changed.]
  • ☞ Remove Hide on Mobile
  • ☞ Remove Interval Check
  • ☞ Minify css and js code automatically while rendering
  • ☞ Can control google,image and class ads request

3.4.1

  • ☞ Make stable with wordpress
  • ☞ Minor Issues Fixed

2.5.5

  • ☞ Fixed: Error shown if adblock is disabled also
  • ☞ Improved: Improved way to check the ad block extension
  • ☞ Added: Now, You can customize interval to check for adblock extensions. On each interval of time, Script will check whether adblock is installed or not. Check the documentation for more details.

2.5.3

  • ☞ Added: Ability to control the multiple request
  • ☞ Improved: Plugin Performance
  • ☞ Added: Ability to Customize icon
  • ☞ Minor Bug fixes

2.5.2

  • ☞ Added: Ability to disable the plugin via filter hook
  • ☞ Minor Bug fixes

2.5.0

  • ☞ Improved : Adjust to theme color
  • ☞ Improved : For Opera Built-in AdBlock extension
  • ☞ Added : New languages added
  • ☞ Minor Bug fixes

sections.reviews:
Works spectacularly

By solaires on March 5, 2024

This is lite, easy to use and straight forward & free! This plugin is all you need for a good Ad Block Detector!

Plugin tốt và hoạt động lỗi nhỏ

By truongtrung014 on March 3, 2024

Plugin tốt và hoạt động nhưng nó hiển thị hình ảnh chặn quảng cáo lớn ở cuối trang mà tôi nghĩ là lỗi. Và cũng vì tùy biến văn bản rất hạn chế và trông kém. Tôi sẽ cho 5 sao nếu những vấn đề này được khắc phục!

Good plugin with Issues

By kinkkumopo on February 23, 2024

Good and working plugin BUT it shows big adblock image at the bottom of the page that I thik is a bug. And also the text customization is very limited and look poor. I will give 5 stars if these issues are fixed!

Fatal error when activating plugin

By bcourcet on February 4, 2024

<b>Fatal error</b>: Uncaught Error: Call to a member function get() on array in /home/u534205500/domains/engorgedtits.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/chp-ads-block-detector/includes/scripts.php:38 Stack trace: #0 /home/u534205500/domains/domain.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/chp-ads-block-detector/includes/dependency.php(41): CHPADB\Includes\scripts->init() #1 /home/u534205500/domains/domain.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/chp-ads-block-detector/chp-adsblocker-detector.php(56): CHPADB\Includes\dependency->init() #2 /home/u534205500/domains/engorgedtits.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/chp-ads-block-detector/chp-adsblocker-detector.php(171): CHPADB\adb->init() #3 /home/u534205500/domains/domain.com/public_html/wp-admin/includes/plugin.php(2318): include_once('/home/u53420550...') #4 /home/u534205500/domains/domain.com/public_html/wp-admin/plugins.php(192): plugin_sandbox_scrape() #5 {main} thrown in <b>/home/u534205500/domains/engorgedtits.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/chp-ads-block-detector/includes/scripts.php</b> on line <b>38</b>

How to make ad block notice cover entire page

By Femi Olawole (fmmike) on March 15, 2023

Pleaae i'll like to know how to cover the entire page to prevent scrolling and reading from transparent overlay. Probably some css codes

Much to be desired

By wilftang on November 13, 2022

CHP Ads Block claims they have tested for uBlock. No, they did not. And they are aware that it is not working properly for uBlock. They even have a dedicated page on their official website for uBlock, offering workarounds. But that does not really work. Even better, their own website has the same issue, even if you have whitelisted their website, the pop-up still appear. So they cannot make it works on their own website as well.

so bad

By elsaid10 on October 8, 2022

Favicon not showing in browser, but OK in admin so bad

The best anti ads blocker i've found!

By Albinus Tejo S (albinustejos) on August 23, 2022

I've tried many anti adblocker from internet recommendation, none of those works well. But this one, is simply works! Install and activated and works!

Works A Treat

By SnappaGuy on August 22, 2022

Great plugin which works like it should, thank you to the developer.

Light, professional and efficient !

By zepolo on July 23, 2022

The best plugin for counter ad blockers, count what is happening, and display a very clean message. The plugin is lightweight and does not slow down when pages loading. The plugin is clean and professional looking, which is very important for notifications (intrusive). There are many settings. I just encountered a problem with the world map which does not work well in terms of statistics. The estimated incomes do not seem very precise or justified, but it is difficult to do otherwise. The CPM or the clicks are variable from one site to another, from one advertising agency to another. But all this is parameterized in advance by the author. In short, a very good plugin. Good support and follow-up too.
